item.title: Ether Machine has received an investment of 150,000 Ether from Jeffrey Berns, who will join the company's board of directors.
item.description: On September 2nd, as reported by Reuters, Ether Machine has secured $654 million worth of Ethereum through a private fundraising round. This comes as the cryptocurrency company is expanding its financial strategy in anticipation of a later listing on Nasdaq this year.The company announced that 150,000 ETH, which was invested by Ethereum's long-time supporter Jeffrey Berns, will be deposited into its wallet later this week. Additionally, Jeffrey Berns will also be appointed to the company's board of directors.

item.title: A Whale Just Bought ~$1.83M Worth of MOG
item.description: On September 2nd, as monitored by Onchain Lens, a whale has made a purchase of 22.78 trillion MOG, which is worth $1.83 million. The payment methods used are USDT and ETH. Currently, this whale holds a total of 30.3 trillion MOG, with an approximate value of $2.58 million.

item.title: Affected by Burn and Upgrade News, BGB Experiences a Short-Term Surge of Over 11%
item.description: On September 2nd, based on market data, BGB witnessed a short-term surge of more than 11% and is currently trading at $5.28.Previously, it was reported that BGB has been upgraded to become the native token of the Morph public chain, with a one-time burning of 220 million tokens.

item.title: Crypto KOL DonAlt deposited 12.97 million WLFI to Binance, realizing a profit of 2.555 million USD
item.description: September 2nd. As per on-chain analyst Ai Yi (@ai_9684xtpa), the suspected crypto KOL DonAlt (@CryptoDonAlt) transferred 12.97 million WLFI tokens to Binance two hours ago, with a value of $3.2 million.Previously, he took part in the WLFI second-round public sale and invested 1000 ETH (approximately $3.25 million). Two hours ago, after withdrawing 12.97 million unlocked tokens from Lockbox, it seemed that he was taking profits. If sold, he would make a profit of $2.555 million.

item.title: Venus Protocol has experienced 3 security incidents in the past, with total losses exceeding $100 million
item.description: September 2nd, the data indicates that the Venus Protocol has witnessed 3 security incidents in the past, with losses exceeding $1 billion. These consist of the following:In May 2021, the governance token XVS was subjected to price manipulation. The attacker borrowed a significant amount of BTC/ETH and then crashed the price, leading to liquidation. As a result, the protocol incurred bad debt and was unable to recover the loans.On May 13, 2022, during the LUNA oracle vulnerability exploit incident, a Chainlink price feed pause caused a price discrepancy in the LUNA token. The attacker took advantage of this vulnerability, resulting in a loss of $11.2 million.In December 2023, a short-term pricing failure occurred in the Binance Oracle, causing the value of assets in the Venus Protocol's snBNB isolated pool to abnormally drop to $240.

item.title: Binance Alpha will list Tradoor (TRADOOR) on September 4th.
item.description: September 2nd. As per the official announcement, Binance Alpha is scheduled to list Tradoor (TRADOOR) on September 4th. Qualified users can access the Alpha event page once the Alpha trading commences and utilize Alpha Points to claim the airdrop. Further details will be provided at a later time.

item.title: BGB Upgraded to Morph Mainnet Token, with 220 Million Coins Burned in One Go
item.description: On September 2nd, Bitget announced an exclusive strategic partnership with the consumer-grade public chain Morph in order to accelerate the on-chain application and ecosystem expansion of BGB. BGB will be upgraded to serve as the Gas token and governance token of the Morph ecosystem. Meanwhile, it will continue to play a role in partner ecosystems such as exchanges and wallets, including participating in Launchpool and core functions like fee discounts.Under this partnership, all BGB tokens governed by the Bitget team will be transferred to the Morph Foundation, with a total of 440 million tokens. Among them, 220 million tokens will be burned immediately, while the remaining 220 million tokens will be locked and unlocked at a rate of 2% per month for liquidity incentives, the expansion of usage scenarios, outreach and education, etc. In addition, the Morph Foundation will update the BGB burning mechanism, which is linked to the activity level of the Morph chain, until the total suppl

item.title: The Venus Protocol is currently paused
item.description: On September 2nd, based on the feedback from community users, the Venus Protocol has been suspended.Earlier, according to a report by PeckShield, Venus Protocol users fell victim to a phishing attack and lost approximately $27 million in cryptocurrency.

item.title: Venus: Suspicious Transaction Detected and Under Active Investigation
item.description: On September 2nd, officials from Venus declared that the suspicious transaction had been identified and was being actively investigated. Venus has currently suspended its operations in accordance with the security protocol. Once more information becomes available, everyone will be notified without delay.

item.title: SlowMist Team: Venus may not have been compromised, and the specific details are still being confirmed
item.description: On September 2nd, SlowMist Cosmic tweeted that, "It is unlikely that Venus was hacked. It is possible that a large whale was phished, leading to a loss of more than $27 million. The specific details are still being verified."
